alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 2:31PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dale, west central Henry and east central Coffee Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 231 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Blue Springs to near Enterprise. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Abbeville, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Level Plains, Newton, New Brockton, Pinckard, Clayhatchee, Hunt Field, Waterford, Hooper Stage Field, Gerald, Clintonville, Ewell, Cairns Aaf, Dale County Lake, Camp Alaflo Bsa and Phillips Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
